channel.title: Hgnn on Star5o的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Hgnn on Star5o的博客

item.title: Aidroid论文复现环境搭建
item.description: https://github.com/liangxun/AiDroid/tree/master docker run –gpus all -it -d –name aidroid -v /home/star5o/dataset:/dataset nvidia/cuda:10.1-cudnn7-devel-ubuntu18.04 /bin/bash conda create -n aidroid python=3.6 source activate aidroid

item.title: Hawk论文复现环境搭建
item.description: https://github.com/RingBDStack/HAWK docker pull tensorflow/tensorflow:1.12.0-devel-gpu-py3 docker run –gpus all -it -d –name hawk -v /home/star5o/dataset:/dataset tensorflow/tensorflow:1.12.0-devel-gpu-py3 docker exec -it hawk bash pip install scikit-learn 运行后发现项目中核心的models文件夹确实，遂作罢。
